title: HR ASSIST, LLC.
description: HR Assist, LLC. is a professional, independent consulting firm that provides a wide array of services in the Human Resources, Benefits, and Payroll arenas.  Additional areas of expertise include Corporate Facilities and Accounting matters.  We provide these services for any size organization that needs additional, expert advice, or that needs to be able to provide cost effective HR, Benefits, and Payroll services for a small staff.
